com.google.android.exoplayer

Interface MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer.EventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MediaCodecTrackRenderer.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer

    public static interface MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer.EventListener
extends MediaCodecTrackRenderer.EventListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be notified of MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer events.

    • Method Summary

      Invoked when an AudioTrack fails to initialize.

    • Method Detail

      • onAudioTrackInitializationError

        void onAudioTrackInitializationError(AudioTrack.InitializationException e)
        Invoked when an AudioTrack fails to initialize.
        Parameters:
        e - The corresponding exception.

      • onAudioTrackWriteError

        void onAudioTrackWriteError(AudioTrack.WriteException e)
        Invoked when an AudioTrack write fails.
        Parameters:
        e - The corresponding exception.

      • onAudioTrackUnderrun

        void onAudioTrackUnderrun(int bufferSize,
                        long bufferSizeMs,
                        long elapsedSinceLastFeedMs)
        Invoked when an AudioTrack underrun occurs.
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - The size of the AudioTrack's buffer, in bytes.
        bufferSizeMs - The size of the AudioTrack's buffer, in milliseconds, if it is configured for PCM output. -1 if it is configured for passthrough output, as the buffered media can have a variable bitrate so the duration may be unknown.
        elapsedSinceLastFeedMs - The time since the AudioTrack was last fed data.
